amendment.description: Amendment sought to strike section 2 of the bill which allows DOE to effectively veto EPA rules.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 1 printed in Part B of House Report 113-174 to strike section 2 of the bill, which allows DOE to effectively veto EPA rules.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Waxman amendment (A001) Failed by recorded vote: 183 - 230 (Roll no. 428).

action.text: Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Waxman amendment (A001) Failed by recorded vote: 183 - 230 (Roll no. 428).
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A001) offered by Mr. Waxman.
